section.heading: Participant eligibility criteria.
section.text: Any individual who receives an Individual Training Account as provided in Chapter 5, section 134 [29 U.S.C. § 2864, repealed] of the Federal Act shall be a bona fide resident of the District.

annotations.annotation: Short title of title XVII of Law 15-39: Section 1701 of D.C. Law 15-39 provided that title XVII of the act may be cited as the Residency Requirement for Individual Training Accounts Funded by the Workforce Investment Act Amendment Act of 2003.
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 1702 of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-149, September 22, 2003, 50 DCR 8360).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 1702 of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-105, June 20, 2003, 50 DCR 5613).
